Package org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins

Class CrosshairOptionsBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.AbstractBaseBuilder
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins.CrosshairOptionsBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsBuilder
    public final class CrosshairOptionsBuilder
extends AbstractBaseBuilder
    Comfortable object to create Crosshair.ID plugin options by a builder.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
